description: To add a skin to your AIMP player, place the ACS3 file in the C:\​Program Files\​AIMP3\​Skins directory. Then go to Skins in the AIMP application, select your skin, and click Apply .
NOTE: The ACS3 file replaced the .ACS2 file with version 3 of AIMP. The ACS2 file can still be opened by version 3 of AIMP.
